law.catch_line: County responsibility for incarceration of prisoners.

text.section: The fiscal court of each county shall provide for the incarceration of prisoners arrested in the county or sentenced or held by order of the courts in the county.

Nothing in this section shall prohibit a county from providing facilities for holding prisoners for limited periods of time and contracting with another county or a city for longer periods of incarceration.
Any county may enter into an agreement pursuant to KRS 65.210 to 65.300 to provide or to use jail facilities.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 13, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 2, effective July 1, 1982.
